CustomObject.description: Custom metadata defining suppression windows for follow-up communications to prevent sending during holidays, fatigue periods, or system maintenance. Supports multiple suppression types (Holiday, Fatigue, Manual, System) with optional timezone awareness. Example: A Follow_Up_Suppression with Suppression_Type__c="Holiday", Start_Date__c="2024-12-24", End_Date__c="2024-12-26", and Timezone_Aware__c=true might suppress all follow-ups during the Christmas holiday period. Another suppression might use Suppression_Type__c="Fatigue" with Fatigue_Rule_Reference__c="Requirement_Incomplete_7_Days" to prevent sending if a recipient has already received the maximum allowed messages in the fatigue window. The follow-up execution service checks active suppressions before sending communications.
CustomObject.label: Follow Up Suppression
